The class {{tt|month}} represents a month in a year. Its normal range is {{closed range plain|1|12}}, but it may hold any number in {{closed range plain|0|255}}. Twelve named constants are predefined in the {{tt|std::chrono}} namespace for the twelve months of the year.

{{tt|month}} is a {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}} {{named req|StandardLayoutType}}.
